title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Front Side", ca. 1985
medium: Black and gold marking pens, turquoise crayon (?) on white tracing paper
description: Three panel screen on wheels in form of three abstract, colorfully decorated buildings. Structure in middle is orange skyscraper with red, stepped motif and two antenae on top.  On either side of central buidling, identical structures in red and green with green fan-shaped tops with clock-like markings.  Bases of three buildings have same triangular pattern in orange and black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Front Side", ca. 1985.
ca. 1985. Black and gold marking pens, turquoise crayon (?) on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-104.
